items.name: Breath of the Council

flavourText: Breathe deep, and give yourself over to eternity.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Create a wall of fire for a duration, which deals burning damage to everything in its area. Each enemy that enters the wall also receives a secondary burning debuff which persists for a short duration after leaving the wall. Any projectiles fired through the wall by you and allies deal added fire damage and apply the wall's secondary debuff on hit.
explicitMods: Deals 437 Base Fire Damage per second
Secondary Debuff Deals 1456.8 Base Fire Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
Maximum 3 Flame Walls at a time
Projectiles which pass through the wall deal 64 to 96 Added Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff giving more poison damage and a chance to inflict poison. When you poison an enemy while you have this buff, you gain Virulence, and summon an Agony Crawler minion that uses projectile and area attacks. You will lose Virulence over time, at a rate which increases the more Virulence you have. The minion will die when you have no Virulence.
explicitMods: Buff grants 40% chance to Poison on Hit
Grants Virulence when you Poison an Enemy
Buff grants 10% more Damage with Poison
Agony Crawler has 4% increased Attack Speed per Virulence you have
Agony Crawler deals 9% increased Physical Damage per Virulence you have
Agony Crawler has 45 to 84 Added Physical Damage per Virulence you have
